version_description: A huge number of improvements and fixes
A huge number of improvements and fixes

Clan fixes.
Sound FX.
New Tutorial.
A huge number of improvements and fixes.
Official release!

Towerlands 1.5 Worldwide release!

What's new:

— Optimization. The game has become more stable.
— 5 new characters: Pharaoh, Dragonlord, Light Archer, Storm, Elementalist.
— Skins for Towers. Upgrade to level 100 and choose one of 24 skins.
— Personal profile for players in clans.
— Saving progress.
— Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.5 Worldwide release!

What's new:

— Optimization. The game has become more stable.
— 5 new characters: Pharaoh, Dragonlord, Light Archer, Storm, Elementalist.
— Skins for Towers. Upgrade to level 100 and choose one of 24 skins.
— Personal profile for players in clans.
— Saving progress.
— Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.5.2

What's new:

— 1000 new enemies waves.
— Optimization. The game has become more stable.
— Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.6

– Portals on the map! New gaming mode. Time to prepare all types of heroes. Win the portals, get the keys and open the chest with a big reward!
– The map is much bigger.
– Even more points for battles on the map.
– A lot of visual changes.
– Bugfixes.

Towerlands 1.7

Added to the game:
— New 1000 Waves
— 2 new units. Fire archer and engineer.
— New module for the tower
— New Tower.
— Battle pass. You will be able to receive awards for passing the waves. The list of awards will include: units, skins, modules, and others.
— Battle statistics. After the battle, you will be able to see the damage list of your characters.
— Battle sets. Save units and tower modules to change them quickly!

Other improvements:
— Getting time for "x2" as a reward for fighting.
— French localization.
— Protection against the accidental crystals waste.
— Optimized performance of the game.

Towerlands 1.7

Added to the game:
— New 1000 Waves
— 2 new units. Fire archer and engineer.
— New module for the tower
— New Tower.
— Battle pass. You will be able to receive awards for passing the waves. The list of awards will include: units, skins, modules, and others.
— Battle statistics. After the battle, you will be able to see the damage list of your characters.
— Battle sets. Save units and tower modules to change them quickly!

Other improvements:
— Getting time for "x2" as a reward for fighting.
— French localization.
— Protection against the accidental crystals waste.
— Optimized performance of the game.

Towerlands 1.8 "Clan Battles".
The time of epic battles is coming to the world of Towerlands!

- We've added "Clan Battles" to the game. You'll have to fight against other clans to take over the new island! You'll meet the new race on the island - Goblins. These tricky monsters fight sneaky and bombing your castle.
- Added new levels for all units.
- Added new skills for the units.
- Added impact indication of upgrade and artifacts improvements.

Towerlands 1.9 "Epic PvP"

- PvP battles with friends! Challenge your clans fellow to a duel and find out who's stronger;
- Get new towers for every first place in the Battle of the Clans!
- The Horde's attack has become even more interesting - new enemies on main waves, including goblins!
- Visual fixes and improvements;
- Bug fixes;
- Added Indonesian localization.

Towerlands 1.9.2

In this version:
- Added new combat modules for towers: Magicians, Arcane cannon, Dragon wrath, Shrapnel;
- And also new types of towers: Dragon flame, Totem summoner, Rocky Guard, Magical castle;
- Now PVP-notifications are more compact. You can now turn them off in settings;
- Visual fixes;
- Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.10

In this version:
- Added 5 new units.
- Changed the appearance of the Tower screen. Now it is easier to change the view of the Tower;
- Added a global chat. Communicate with players all over the world or only from your region;
- The Map has been changed. Now not conquered castles are hidden in the fog. By capturing them you will illuminate the whole map;
- Localization fixes;
- Balance corrections;
- Visual improvements;
- Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.10

In this version:
- Added 5 new units.
- Changed the appearance of the Tower screen. Now it is easier to change the view of the Tower;
- Added a global chat. Communicate with players all over the world or only from your region;
- The Map has been changed. Now not conquered castles are hidden in the fog. By capturing them you will illuminate the whole map;
- Localization fixes;
- Balance corrections;
- Visual improvements;
- Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.11

In this version:
- Added clan upgrades. Players in clans get "clan's experience" from fighting, which then turns into "clan points". Invest them into one of the seven upgrades;
- Camera is moving back in Autoplay mode, that helps to better follow the battle;
- Now you can pin the message to clan chat;
- Bug fixes;
- Improve the balance of the game.

Towerlands 1.12 "Winter Battles"

In this version:
- The new winter event! Fight other players and receive Crowns and Stones for each victory. Battle rewards can be exchanged for valuable prizes;
- Now, each view ad fills up a special scale. Build up your rewards for more gifts!
- Chat in clan chat with stickers!
- Added 4 new units: Ice Master, Exploding, Demon hunter, Builder;
- As well as 3 new towers: Predatory hedge, Hand of the Golem, Ent. And one new module: Stronghold;
- Some units dressed up in festive costumes!
- Bug fixes and game optimizations.

Towerlands 1.13

In this version:
- Visual improvements;
- Bug fixes.

Towerlands 1.15

In this version:
- New content for Tower: 3 skins, 4 combat modules;
- Added new Unit - Pyromancer;
- All units have received another 100 levels to improve;
- New Castles appeared on the map;
- Added Piggy Bank. You can now buy more crystals for a small price.
